name: Wraiths of the Past
description:
Help the unknown hero, to defeat his past by drawing marks in the air and killing the wraiths

Press Alt+F4 to close it

F11 to change fullscreen/window mode

Made for Mini Jam 77: Courage

A game by NickΞnd and IcyLeamon

Music from  Raydar

V1.0.1.0 Just a small patch and now it's a Setup file
